com.topcoder.search.builder.hibernate
Class OrFragmentBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.search.builder.hibernate.OrFragmentBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
SearchFragmentBuilder
public class OrFragmentBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements SearchFragmentBuilder

This class is used for building the HQL Where clause according to the OrFilter and appends it to the searchContext.

Thread Safety: This class is thread-safe. All state information is handled within the searchContext and only one SearchContext is used per thread.

Since:
1.4
Version:
1.4
Author:
kurtrips, myxgyy

Method Detail

buildSearch

public void buildSearch(Filter filter,
                        SearchContext searchContext)
                 throws UnrecognizedFilterException
Builds the HQL Where clause according to the OrFilter and appends it to the searchContext.

Specified by:
buildSearch in interface SearchFragmentBuilder
Parameters:
filter - The filter to create the Where clause with.
searchContext - The searchContext on which to write the resultant HQL string.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If either parameter is null.
UnrecognizedFilterException - If the provided Filter is not an OrFilter or if any inner filter is not an associated filter.
